en.bdb: The apostate posseses everything but still is unhappy
In the month of savan, the whole forest becomes green but javels, a prickly plant remains dry.

verse.gurmukhi: sB ko srsw vrsdy JUry jolwhw[
verse.unicode: ਸਭ ਕੋ ਸਰਸਾ ਵਰਸਦੇ ਝੂਰੇ ਜੋਲਾਹਾ।

en.bdb: During rains every one feels delighted but the weaver is seen gloomy.

transliteration.english: sabh ko sarasaa varasadhe jhoore jolaahaa|
transliteration.hindi: सभ को सरसा वरसदे झूरे जोलाहा।
transliteration.en: sabh ko sarasaa varasadhe jhoore jolaahaa|
transliteration.hi: सभ को सरसा वरसदे झूरे जोलाहा।
transliteration.ipa: səɓ kɔ sərəsɑ ʋərəsəd̪e ɖ͡ʐure d͡ʒɔlɑhɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبھ کو سرسا ورسدے جھُورے جولاها۔

en.bdb: In the night all the pairs meet but for chakavi , that is the time of separation.

verse.gurmukhi: sMKu smuMdhu sKxw rovY dy Dwhw[
verse.unicode: ਸੰਖੁ ਸਮੁੰਦਹੁ ਸਖਣਾ ਰੋਵੈ ਦੇ ਧਾਹਾ।

en.bdb: The conch remains empty even in the ocean and cries when blown.

transliteration.english: sa(n)kh samu(n)dhahu sakhanaa rovai dhe dhaahaa|
transliteration.hindi: संखु समुँदहु सखणा रोवै दे धाहा।
transliteration.en: sa(n)kh samu(n)dhahu sakhanaa rovai dhe dhaahaa|
transliteration.hi: संखु समुँदहु सखणा रोवै दे धाहा।
transliteration.ipa: səŋkʰ səmʊŋd̪əh səkʰəɳɑ rɔʋæ d̪e t̪ɑhɑ.
transliteration.ur: سںکھ سمںدهُ سکھݨا رووَے دے دھاها۔

verse.gurmukhi: rwhhu auJiV jo pvY musY dy Pwhw[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਹਹੁ ਉਝੜਿ ਜੋ ਪਵੈ ਮੁਸੈ ਦੇ ਫਾਹਾ।

en.bdb: The man gone astray will definitely be robbed by putting rope around his neck.

transliteration.english: raahahu ujhaR jo pavai musai dhe faahaa|
transliteration.hindi: राहहु उझड़ि जो पवै मुसै दे फाहा।
transliteration.en: raahahu ujhaR jo pavai musai dhe faahaa|
transliteration.hi: राहहु उझड़ि जो पवै मुसै दे फाहा।
transliteration.ipa: rɑhəh oʊɖ͡ʐəɽ d͡ʒɔ pəʋæ mʊsæ d̪e fɑhɑ.
transliteration.ur: راههُ اُجھڑ جو پوَے مُسَے دے پھاها۔

verse.gurmukhi: iqau jg AMdir bymuKW inq auBy swhw ]5]
verse.unicode: ਤਿਉ ਜਗ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਬੇਮੁਖਾਂ ਨਿਤ ਉਭੇ ਸਾਹਾ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: Similarly, the apostates go on sobbing in this world.

transliteration.english: tiau jag a(n)dhar bemukhaa(n) nit ubhe saahaa ||5||
transliteration.hindi: तिउ जग अंदरि बेमुखाँ नित उभे साहा ॥५॥
transliteration.en: tiau jag a(n)dhar bemukhaa(n) nit ubhe saahaa ||5||
transliteration.hi: तिउ जग अंदरि बेमुखाँ नित उभे साहा ॥५॥
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪo d͡ʒəG əŋd̪ər bemʊkʰɑⁿ nɪt̪ oʊɓe sɑhɑ.5.
transliteration.ur: تِا جگ اںدر بےمکھاں نت اُبھے ساها ۔۔۵۔۔
